programlisting:
<file:aardvark-noun> a dmlex:Entry;
  dmlex:headword "aardvark";
  dmlex:pronunciation [ a dmlex:Pronunciation;
      dmlex:transcription [ a dmlex:Transcription;
          dmlex:text "a:rdva:rk";
          dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ];
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ].
